Home.description: Voicing Papers, Bringing Research to Life.
Home.EpisodesDescription: You can check the list of episodes you have recorded.
Home.ChannelsDescription: You can check the list of other users' channels.
Home.RecordingDescription: You can record a new episode from research paper PDFs.

Channels.Channels Page is disabled to protect cop: Channels Page is disabled to protect copyright on the papers.

ChannelCard.Episodes Number: {count, plural, =0 {No episodes} one {# episode} other {# episodes}}

Recording.Generate a new episode from research pap: Please use the podcasts you have created for personal use only, taking into consideration the copyright of the paper.
Recording.Drag and drop PDFs or click this box to: Drag and drop PDFs or click this box to select.
Recording.Title of the podcast to be generated Dis: Title of the podcast to be generated. Displayed as a title in the list.
Recording.eg PaperWave Listening to Research Paper: e.g. PaperWave: Listening to Research Papers as Conversational Podcasts Scripted by LLM
Recording.Podcasts are generated for an approximat: Podcasts are generated for an approximate specified length of time. If the specified time is too long for the content of the paper, programs that repeat the same content are likely to be generated.
Recording.Enter keywords for the episode separated: Enter keywords for the episode, separated by commas.
Recording.Podcast, Research paper, Large language: Podcast, Research paper, Large language models, Autobiographical design, Field study

Settings.Currently, there are no settings availab: Currently, there are no settings available.

Login.You can try PaperWave for free: You can try PaperWave for free.
Login.Please log in with your Google account P: Please log in with your Google account. PaperWave will show you a list of your podcasts.

Acknowledgements.This work was supported by JSPS KAKENHI: This work was supported by JSPS KAKENHI Grant Number JP22KJ1010 and Nakayama Future Factory. We would like to thank the collaborators of the field study and the design workshop for their valuable insights and feedback.
